metadata.Title: CVE-2022-39331 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium.
metadata.Description: Nexcloud desktop is the Desktop sync client for Nextcloud. An attacker can inject arbitrary HyperText Markup Language into the Desktop Client application in the notifications. It is recommended that the Nextcloud Desktop client is upgraded to 3.6.1. There are no known workarounds for this issue.

criterions.comment: nextcloud-desktop package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
